firstCharacteristic: It is easy to put on and does not slip.
secondCharacteristic: The nitrile composition and the absence of starch powder reduce the risk of hypersensitivity and allergic reactions, which sometimes occur with starch or latex.
thirdCharacteristic: Due to the material, it provides increased comfort.
fourthCharacteristic: The cuff has a border that prevents the glove from slipping or rolling.
fifthCharacteristic: Protects from unwanted or dangerous substances.
sixthCharacteristic: The textured surface of the fingers improves the grip on dry or wet bodies and surfaces.
gloveTypeContent: 3.5g nitrile examination gloves, accelerator free, powder free, single chlorinated, non sterile
gloveValidityContent: 5 years (in original packaging if stored according to ISO 2230)
glovePackagingContent: 100 pcs gloves x 10 boxes x 1 box
glovePurposeContent: medical device class I, according to the provisions of Regulation MD (EU) 2017/745, Disposable protective gloves - EIP category III (protection against chemical substances for a limited time)
